title: Are The Democrats Planning a Post Election Coup? (Ep 1365)
description:
In this episode, I discuss Mike Pence’s destruction of the hapless Kamala Harris at the Vice Presidential debate last night. I also address the troubling evidence that influential Democrats are planning a post elections coup if Donald Trump wins. 

News Picks:

Are the Democrats planning a coup in the event of a Trump election win?

President Trump rejects the ridiculous proposal for a virtual debate.


Kamala Harris doesn’t want to talk about her extreme agenda.

Kamala Harris still refuses to answer a question about packing the Supreme Court.


NJ postal worker arrested for throwing out mail in ballots.


George Soros is back!


An update on my procedure yesterday. 



Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
